Visualisation

Visualise missing data

geom_missing_point

geom_missing_point

gg_missing_case

Plot the number of missings per case (row)

gg_missing_var

Plot the number of missings for each variable

gg_missing_which

Plot which variables contain a missing value

Numerical Summaries

Provide tidy data frame summaries of missingness

n_miss

Return the number of missing values

n_complete

Return the number of complete values

miss_case_pct

Percentage of cases that contain a missing values.

miss_case_summary

Summarise the missingness in each case

miss_case_table

Tabulate missings in cases.

miss_cat

Create factor levels of missingness for two variables

miss_df_pct

Percentage of missing data in a dataframe

miss_summary

Collate summary measures from narnia into one tibble

miss_var_pct

Percentage of variables containing missings

miss_var_summary

Summarise the missingness in each variable

miss_var_table

Tabulate the missings in the variables

Add columns

Add the number of missing and proportion of missing data

add_n_miss

Add column containing number of missing data values

add_prop_miss

Add column containing proportion of missing data values

Data structures for missing data

Creation and Manipulation of Shadow Matrices

as_shadow

Create shadow data

bind_shadow

Column bind a shadow dataframe to original data

gather_shadow

gather_shadow

is_na

Give NAs a more meaningful label
